message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you'll get a decent chunk.  Accept this, and we can both walk away happy.
I think we can find a more equitable split. This offer reflects the fact that I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm also confident in my ability to get a better deal in the future.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a better deal than your last offer. This is a fair split that reflects the changing value of the money.
